name: Artisan Sourdough Bread
description: Traditional artisan sourdough with a perfectly crispy crust and tangy, airy crumb. Requires active sourdough starter and patience for the best results.

steps.instruction: Ensure your sourdough starter is active and has doubled in size within 4-6 hours of feeding.
Mix flours in a large bowl. In a separate bowl, combine starter with lukewarm water until well dissolved.
Add starter mixture to flour and mix until no dry flour remains. Cover and autolyse for 30 minutes.
Add salt and mix thoroughly. Perform 4 sets of stretch and folds every 30 minutes over 2 hours.
Bulk ferment at room temperature for 4-6 hours until dough increases by 50% and feels jiggly.
Pre-shape dough into a round, rest 20 minutes, then final shape into a boule or batard.
Place in banneton seam-side up, cover, and cold retard in refrigerator for 12-24 hours.
Preheat Dutch oven to 475Â°F. Score dough and bake covered for 20 minutes, then uncovered for 25 minutes until golden.
